description.header: Keep important homework projects, a laptop, and other items in one place with this JanSport Cool Student black backpack.
description.paragraph: Bring assignments, books, and other items on the go with this black backpack. Featuring an internal sleeve, this backpack provides enough space for a 15-inch laptop, while the side water bottle pocket helps keep you hydrated as you go from class to class. The fully padded back panel and ergonomic S-curve shoulder straps offer enhanced comfort, making it easy to walk long distances while carrying a heavy load. Made with premium materials, this backpack has increased durability, so it's a great option for long-term use. This JanSport Cool Student backpack has two main compartments as well as a pleated front pocket, providing plenty of room for various items.
bullets: Designed to fit a range of laptops with screens up to 15"
Premium synthetic leather bottom and trims.
